overview: Joe Jackson's 1980 and 1983 (three separate concerts!) performances on German TV. The first "Rockpalast" performance in March 1980 features Jackson and band performing songs from his new wave punk era as well as hints of things to come. The 1983 shows focus on his classic album "Night and Day" and its jazz, pop sound as well as revisiting his previous hits. Top notch songwriting and performances.
title: Joe Jackson: Live at Rockpalast
